articles.title: Biden says he warned Putin of 'heavy price' over Ukraine - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden said on Friday he told his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin that a move on Ukraine will draw sanctions and an increased U.S. presence in Europe, where tensions are high after Russia's military buildup at the border.
articles.content: WILMINGTON, Del., Dec 31 (Reuters) - President Joe Biden said on Friday he told his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin that a move on Ukraine will draw sanctions and an increased U.S. presence in Eur… [+2141 chars]

articles.title: WHO warns of COVID variant 'tsunami' as world cases hit record - Eyewitness News
articles.description: The surge, currently worst in Europe, is forcing governments to walk a tightrope between imposing restrictions designed to stop hospitals from becoming overwhelmed and the need to keep economies and societies open two years after the virus first emerged in la…
